faqs.question: Могут ли иностранцы купить недвижимость в Испании?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Foreigners can freely purchase property in Spain without residency requirements. British nationals, EU citizens, and international buyers simply need a Spanish tax identification number (NIE) and basic documentation. The process is straightforward with experienced local solicitors handling all legalities. Property ownership does not require Spanish residency, making it ideal for holiday home purchases.

faqs.question: Каковы расходы на покупку недвижимости в Испании?
faqs.answer: Spanish property purchase costs typically include 6-10% transfer tax, 1-2% notary and legal fees, and approximately 1% property registration costs. First-time buyers in some regions receive tax reductions. Total costs usually range 8-13% of purchase price. After acquisition, annual property taxes are minimal (typically €200-400 for residential properties) plus utilities. Rental properties have different tax considerations with professional advice recommended.

faqs.question: Как далеко Коста-Бланка от России?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca is approximately 1,000 kilometers from the UK, with Alicante Airport just 45 minutes from Gata de Gorgos offering direct flights to UK destinations. Flight times average 2-2.5 hours, making weekend trips and extended holiday visits very convenient. Regular budget airline services keep travel costs reasonable for frequent journeys.

faqs.question: Какая погода на Коста-Бланке?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca enjoys exceptional Mediterranean climate with approximately 320 days of sunshine annually. Summers (June-September) reach 28-32°C with minimal rainfall, perfect for beach activities. Winters (December-February) average 15-18°C—mild compared to UK weather, requiring light clothing rather than heavy winter gear. Spring and autumn offer ideal temperatures (20-25°C) for outdoor exploring. Rainfall is minimal, concentrated in autumn months.

faqs.question: Могу ли я получить ипотеку в Испании как иностранец?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreign buyers can obtain Spanish mortgages from local and international banks. Most require 30-40% deposit with mortgages available at competitive rates (typically 3-4.5% for fixed-rate products). Spanish banks work with international income documentation, and many have English-speaking departments. Alternative financing through UK lenders is also available. A Spanish solicitor can guide mortgage arrangements.

faqs.question: Какова стоимость жизни на Коста-Бланке?
faqs.answer: Cost of living in Costa Blanca is considerably lower than the UK. Groceries, dining out, and utilities cost approximately 30-40% less than British equivalents.
